contentList.content: The target gains a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Gains a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Throw a bubble of acid that damages each creature it hits and covers them in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ACID">Acid</LSTag>.
Project a puff of noxious gas and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">poison</LSTag> the target.
Gains a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
